snippet: The Giants need help at safety after Antrel Rolle, a defensive mainstay for the last five seasons, left to sign a three-year contract worth $11.25 million with Chicago.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants must find new safety after Antrel Rolle signs with Chicago Bears.
lead_paragraph: The Giants need help at safety after Antrel Rolle, a defensive mainstay for the last five seasons, left to sign a three-year contract worth $11.25 million with Chicago.

headline.main: Giants Lose Safety Antrel Rolle to Bears
